mapper.select: SELECT r.seq, r.member_id, CASE WHEN r.reserve_title_code = '1' THEN '회의실' WHEN r.reserve_title_code = '2' THEN '비품' WHEN r.reserve_title_code = '3' THEN '차량' ELSE '기타' END AS reserve_title_code, r.purpose, r.start_time, r.end_time, r.state FROM reserve r WHERE r.state = 'N' AND r.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY r.start_time
